Posts.Content: Jun 20, 2017 02:39AM SarasotaLady wrote: Diagnosed at age 74-- have been having mammos for as long as I can recall. Don't stop having mammos at age 70. Dx 4/2017, ILC, Right, <1cm, Grade 1, ER+/PR+, HER2- Lumpectomy 5/18/17 Stage pT1b, pNO
Posts.Title: Would you mind sharing your age at time of diagnosis? ByFaith Gussy
